name: Bar Fly 2.0 Black
description:
The Bar Fly 2.0 is designed with an aerodynamic low profile that places the Garmin Computer screen inline, out front, and level with the handlebar/stem.  Wether you are using the Garmin 200/500 or larger 510/800/810, our clever Dual Mounting Position design is optimized with no screws to lose and no bolts to adjust.  

Taking aesthetic and function one step further, we've engineered a platform for Shimano Di2 and Campagnolo EPS electronic shifting modules on the underside of the 2.0.   This platform will also integrate with a safety light to be released summer 2013.

Our single bolt, Full Wrap Clamp is easy to install without removing the handlebar tape and is added protection that your Garmin will never "fall off" even without the bolt over the roughest terrain.     

Tested at the highest level.  The Bar Fly is the preferred choice of Pro Tour road cyclist, Ironman triathletes, and World Champion mountain bike racers. 

Plastic on Plastic design. 

Garmin computers are made of Plastic and so is the Bar Fly.  We chose Delrin, the highest quality plastic, because it is the most appropriate material for this key interface.  Hard materials such as aluminum have been found to "eat away," and "shave off," material that can permanently damage your Garmin computer.  
 
With Bar Fly products there is always Zero Risk of over-tightening  
Carbon handlebar safe.
Features

New design with a lower more aerodynamic profile.

Dual Positions Optimized for Garmin Edge 200/500 and 510/800/810.
Positive Engagement with a Click. 

Integration with Shimano Di2 and Campagnolo EPS modules.

Full wrap clamp will never fall off.

22 grams

Made in the USA

name: Bar Fly Tri Mount
description:
The Bar Fly TT was designed specifically for Triathletes and Time Trialists, and incorporates the same patent pending 1/8th turn mechanism used on the Bar Fly 1.1. Because 1/8th turn allows the display to be mounted in 90’ increments, Bar Fly TT is compatible with the Garmin Forerunner watch and Garmin Edge series cycling computers. Bar Fly TT accepts a variety of mounting options for both computers along either side of the aero extensions and allows plenty of room for your aero bar mounted hydration and nutrition accessories.

FUNCTION

At the heart of the Bar Fly TT is 1/8th turn technology and it’s the center point of our new mounting system. The 1/8th turn mechanism is a patent pending positive engagement system that enables cross compatibility with all Garmin Edge series cycling computers, and the Garmin Forerunner 910 XT and 310 XT watches. With Bar Fly 1.1 transitioning between multiple computers from dirt to pavement and run to bike has never been this easy. Stay centered on all your bikes with Bar Fly 1.1. and the Bar Fly TT.

Bar Fly TT easily mounts to all popular aero extensions with a 22mm – 22.5mm diameter

Bar Fly TT is compatible with the following Garmin computers: 
Forerunner 910 XT and 310 XT watches* 
All Edge series cycling computers, including the 200, 500, and 800. 
* requires the use of the Garmin Forerunner Quick Release Kit sold separately

name: Bar Fly 1.1 Handlebar Mount Black
description:
At the heart of the Bar Fly 1.1 is 1/8th turn technology and it’s the center point of our new mounting system. The 1/8th turn mechanism is a patent pending positive engagement system that enables cross compatibility with all Garmin Edge series cycling computers, and the Garmin Forerunner 910 XT and 310 XT watches. With Bar Fly 1.1 transitioning between multiple computers from dirt to pavement and run to bike has never been this easy. Stay centered on all your bikes with Bar Fly 1.1.

Made in the USA out of Delrin with no screws to lose, Bar Fly 1.1 is the only mount that positions all of your Garmin devices directly in the center of the handlebar in a safe and aesthetic viewing position.

name: DMT Top Tri
description:
The values of Top Tri

For 2013, DMT conceived a second model
of triathlon shoes. Based on the recommendations
of athletes that practice this sport
at professional level, NEW TOP TRI was born.
Closure is guaranteed by the Atop
system, the upper is in microfiber, it is studied
on the instep in order to be put on quickly,
a tongue has been introduced on the rear side
to facilitate wear, the interchangeable heel
was extended to mid length to protect
the shoes from wearing when running on foot
holding the bike, all assembled on our 
New Carbon Sole in carbon fibre.

ATOP
ATOP can be worked loose or closed by turning the device in order to obtain the maximum comfort and performances.

New external counter
External counter with anatomic support to provide a very high stability in cycling and to increase the constraint of the heel. Anti-shock - Anti-slip. Anti-shock - Anti-scalzante.

Tongue
Drilled tongue with a large thick padding: new features that provide maximum comfort and excellent breathability. Fairlead for the ATOP closure.
